file.name: positive4.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Simple API Overview
  version: 1.0.0
  contact:
    name: contact
    url: https://www.google.com/
    email: user@gmail.com
paths:
  "/":
    head:
      operationId: headers
      summary: headers
      responses:
        "200":
          description: wrong example
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                "$ref": "#/components/ApiVersion"
components:
  schemas:
    ApiVersion:
      type: object
      discriminator:
        propertyName: ApiVersion
      properties:
        code:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        version:
          type: string
